item.title: Sex, drugs, and a pair of pink boots
item.author: Celia Usero Navarro,
item.description: Reading the book felt as if I was living the story through the eyes of the characters. The first character you are introduced to in The Pink Boots is Tayel. He sleeps with girls just because he can. Listening to the girl’s shallow blabber and putting up with lame TV shows in return for mediocre sex …
